DASHBOARD._title: DOME Marketplace is out! See what's new
DASHBOARD._subheader: Join the first open distributed marketplace ecosystem for cloud, edge & AI services in Europe.
DASHBOARD._search_ph: Search Cloud Services, Edge Services, Providers...

PLATFORM._subtitle: Your Gateway to Europe's Premier Digital Ecosystem

OPEN._desc: Navigate with confidence through transparent practices in service provisioning, pricing and operations.

INTEROPERABLE._desc: Unlock endless possibilities with our open ecosystem, designed for seamless collaboration and innovation.

TRUSTWORTHY._desc: Build on a foundation of trust with services vetted for security, reliability and compliance.

COMPLIANT._desc: Stay ahead of the curve with services that adhere strictly to EU regulations and standards, for legal compliance and data protection.

SUSTAINABLE._desc: Embrace sustainability with services that prioritize enery efficiency and environmental responsability.

TRANSPARENT._desc: Navigate with confidence trough transparent practices in service provisioning, pricing and operations.

HOWITWORKS._subtitle: Discover how DOME Marketplace connects you to Europe's finest cloud and edge services

CUSTOMERS._search_desc: Use our intuitive search to find the services that match your digital transformation needs.
CUSTOMERS._compare_desc: Evaluate services based on features, EU compliance and reviews to make informed choices.
CUSTOMERS._seamless_desc: Follow our easy process to integrate and deploy your chosen services swiftly.
CUSTOMERS._description: The marketplace is actually free to browse. Take a look at the catalogue contents, search for the services you need, verify the different offerings, get in touch with the service providers to better understand the proposal and acquire the desired service.

PROVIDERS._register_desc: Sign up and submit your european service for validation, ensuring compliance and quality.
PROVIDERS._verified_desc: Our team will quickly verify your offerings to ensure they meet Distributed Open Marketplace standards.
PROVIDERS._reach_desc: Once verified, your services will be accessible to a wide European audience, ready to grow your business.
PROVIDERS._description_start: Qualify you company through the reference
PROVIDERS._description_end: and then start describing your offerings through the Offering qualification process and star being visible on the market inside this trustable catalogue.

EXPLORE._title: Explore the Distributed Open Marketplace Project
EXPLORE._subtitle: Whether you're seeking in-depth reports, latest updates or upcoming events, everything ou need to know is just a click away
EXPLORE._events_desc: Join us at our next event or webinar to connect with fellow innovators, learn from industry leaders and discover new opportunities within the 'DOME' Project's ecosystem.
EXPLORE._updates_desc: Stay informed with the latest developments, service enhancements and industry insights directly from the 'DOME' Project's website.
EXPLORE._resources_desc: Access our library of resources, detailed reports and case studies to gain a deep understanding of the cloud and edge market landscape and 'DOME' Project's impact.

PRICE_PLANS._online_payment_long: Is this product to be paid online?
PRICE_PLANS._online_payment_desc: By checking this box, all the price plans of this offer will be paid online. Leave it unchecked if you want offline payments.
PRICE_PLANS._locked_after_first_plan: Locked. You can't change it after defining the first price plan.
PRICE_PLANS._no_price_plans: This offer has no Price Plans at this moment. So currently it is FREE.
PRICE_PLANS._no_price_plans_components: This offer has no Price Components. You need to add at least one!
PRICE_PLANS._sure_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this Price Plan?
PRICE_PLANS._currency: Set the currency that must be used in all the price components of this price plan
PRICE_PLANS._profile_desc: If you want this price plan to apply exclusively to a specific product configuration, select that configuration here.
PRICE_PLANS._price_comp_with_chars: If you want this price plan to apply exclusively to a specific product configuration, remove the selected characteristics from the created price components.
PRICE_PLANS._prod_spec_no_chars: The selected product specification has no characteristics related.

PRICE_PLAN_COMPONENT._apply_to_char: Does this price component apply to a product characteristic?
PRICE_PLAN_COMPONENT._prod_char_info: If the price component applies to a product characteristic, select it and a value below if needed.
PRICE_PLAN_COMPONENT._price_positive: Price must be a positive number.
PRICE_PLAN_COMPONENT._includes_discount: Does this price component include a discount?
PRICE_PLAN_COMPONENT._duration_positive: Duration must be a positive number.
PRICE_PLAN_COMPONENT._delete_price_comp: Are you sure you want to delete this Price Component?

ABOUT_DOME._subtitle: Your one-stop-shop for trusted Cloud and Edge services.
ABOUT_DOME._description: DOME Marketplace is a comprehensive online catalogue of cloud and edge offerings, available through a collection of independent marketplaces and different product and service providers.
ABOUT_DOME._description2: The uniqueness of the DOME marketplace is its ability to generate and use verifiable credentials ensuring the publication of trusted services, according to EU regulation. In other words, it enables a standardised process to verify that services and providers are certified and trustable.
ABOUT_DOME._benefits: Among its benefits, DOME Marketplace offers several advantages to users:
ABOUT_DOME._trusted: Provides trusted and standardised access to service providers’ offers, matching customers’ demands.
ABOUT_DOME._verified: Ensures verified and comparable qualifications across services and products.
ABOUT_DOME._transactions: Facilitates simple and transparent transactions and service management.
ABOUT_DOME._whydescription: DOME Marketplace, with this single aggregated catalogue of products delivered by pre-validated European suppliers, aims to streamline the procurement journey, improve vendor selection, reduce search and evaluation time, facilitate product comparison, accelerate purchasing processes and simplify spending analysis, benefiting both buyers and suppliers within the European ecosystem.
ABOUT_DOME._central: DOME Marketplace: A central piece of Europe’s Digital future.
ABOUT_DOME._aligned: DOME Marketplace is aligned with Europe’s vision of a digital future powered by cloud computing. The marketplace has been deployed by the DOME project, as part of the European Commission’s strategy to co-invest with Member States in the development of new digital infrastructures, as well as to improve existing capabilities at both national and EU levels.
ABOUT_DOME._singlepoint: The goal is to provide European companies and public organisations with the single-point access to trusted cloud and edge services, necessary for digital transformation. In this context, DOME Marketplace has been designed to offer a better and greater availability of trusted cloud and edge services, offered by providers and marketplaces members of the DOME ecosystem,
ABOUT_DOME._focus: focusing on increasing the adoption of these services among public and private entities, particularly in sectors that handle sensitive data, and who may be lagging behind in cloud adoption. This marketplace is a fundamental part of the EU’s objective to strengthen open strategic digital autonomy and boost Europe’s digital future.
ABOUT_DOME._explore: Explore the DOME project website if you want to know more!

CONTACTUS._subtitle: We are glad you are interested in the DOME Marketplace! Please share your questions or thoughts with us and we'll get back to you shortly.
CONTACTUS._fill: Please fill in this form to contact us
CONTACTUS._fieldlong: This field is too long. Must be less than 100 characters.
CONTACTUS._emaillong: Email is too long. Must be less than 320 characters.
CONTACTUS._emailpattern: Email must follow the following format: example@example.example
CONTACTUS._info: Information about the processing of personal data is as follows:
CONTACTUS._purpose: Purpose: to send you information about DOME's project by electronic means. Legal basis: data subject's consent. Recipients: The personal data collected will not be communicated to third parties, unless requested by public administrations or if required by law. Exercise of Rights: sending an email to
CONTACTUS._indicating: indicating in the subject line: 'Exercise of rights'. You are also entitled to be assisted by a Data Protection Authority. Find more information about personal data processing in
CONTACTUS._thanks: Thank you for contacting DOME Marketplace.
